name: WorkflowEnt
description: A complete workflow. TODO alternative name maybe WorkflowContentEnt if MetaNodeEnt is renamed to WorkflowEnt

fields.name: MetaInPortInfos
fields.description: The inputs of a metanode (if this workflow is one).

fields.name: MetaOutPortInfos
fields.description: The outputs of a metanode (if this workflow is one).

fields.name: WorkflowAnnotations
fields.description: List of all workflow annotations. TODO could be moved to an extra UI service in order to not polute the WorkflowEnt too much and separate UI logics.

fields.name: WorkflowUIInfo
fields.description: Additional workflow UI information such as grid settings, connection appearance etc. TODO could be moved to an extra UI service in order to not polute the WorkflowEnt too much and separate UI logics.
